sentences.sContent: She finished putting the milk away and turned around.
sentences.sCn: 她把牛奶收拾完后转过身来。

sentences.sContent: "Yes, Mom," replied Cheryl as she slowly put away her doll.
sentences.sCn: “是的，妈妈，”谢里尔一边回答，一边慢慢地把她的玩具娃娃收起来。

trans.tranOther: If you put something away, you put it into the place where it is normally kept when it is not being used, for example, in a drawer
